props.name: alwaysShowTabs
props.desc: True to always display tabs even when there is only 1 panel (defaults to false)

props.name: animate
props.desc: True to animate expand/collapse (defaults to false)

props.name: autoHide
props.desc: False to disable auto hiding when the mouse leaves the "floated" region (defaults to true)

props.name: autoScroll
props.desc: True to enable overflow scrolling (defaults to false)

props.name: closeOnTab
props.desc: True to place the close icon on the tabs instead of the region titlebar (defaults to false)

props.name: cmargins
props.desc: Margins for the element when collapsed (defaults to: north/south {top: 2, left: 0, right:0, bottom: 2} or east/west {top: 0, left: 2, right:2, bottom: 0})

props.name: collapsed
props.desc: True to set the initial display to collapsed (defaults to false)

props.name: collapsedTitle
props.desc: Optional string message to display in the collapsed block of a north or south region

props.name: collapsible
props.desc: False to disable collapsing (defaults to true)

props.name: disableTabTips
props.desc: True to disable tab tooltips

props.name: floatable
props.desc: False to disable floating (defaults to true)

props.name: height
props.desc: For North/South panels

props.name: hidden
props.desc: True to start the region hidden (defaults to false)

props.name: hideTabs
props.desc: True to hide the tab strip (defaults to false)

props.name: hideWhenEmpty
props.desc: True to hide the region when it has no panels

props.name: margins
props.desc: Margins for the element (defaults to {top: 0, left: 0, right:0, bottom: 0})

props.name: minTabWidth
props.desc: The minimum tab width (defaults to 40)

props.name: preferredTabWidth
props.desc: The preferred tab width (defaults to 150)

props.name: preservePanels
props.desc: True to preserve removed panels so they can be readded later (defaults to false)

props.name: resizeTabs
props.desc:
True to enable automatic tab resizing. This will resize the tabs so they are all the same size and fit within
the space available, similar to FireFox 1.5 tabs (defaults to false)

props.name: showPin
props.desc: True to show a pin button

props.name: split
props.desc: To show the splitter

props.name: tabPosition
props.desc: "top" or "bottom" (defaults to "bottom")

props.name: title
props.desc: The title for the region (overrides panel titles)

props.name: titlebar
props.desc: True to display a title bar (defaults to true)

props.name: width
props.desc: For East/West panels
